about_the_game:
Venusville is a city builder game where you guide a group of space settlers trying to establish a city among the clouds of Venus.

In the game you play the role of the base architect and manager, telling your colonists which way to extend the floating city and build the structures they will need to survive. You will have to ensure that they have a constant supply of oxygen, food and water while managing temperatures and pressure to stay alive.

You will get them to collect energy, extract water, mine clouds, grow food, manufacture bots, and build a fully self-sufficient base in a harsh environment, where you are always one step away from total failure.

Buoyancy and Balance


You are tasked with the crucial role of managing the city’s stability in the Venusian skies.

Different structures in your city possess distinct weights and buoyancy levels, requiring meticulous oversight to prevent imbalances that could lead to catastrophic flips or structural failures. Heavier elements like batteries and engines must be strategically positioned to maintain equilibrium.

Maintaining buoyancy is not only a matter of balance but also a survival tactic, as it keeps your city above the perilous temperatures and pressures found in the deeper Venusian atmosphere. This delicate balancing act is central to expanding your city and ensuring the safety of your colonists.

Navigating the Clouds


Adding engines to your city is a game-changer, allowing for mobility beyond mere buoyancy. This mobility lets you strategically navigate the volatile skies of Venus.

You can position your city to continuously harvest solar energy by staying on the sunlit side of the planet, evade dangerous storms, and avoid areas with high concentrations of sulfuric acid.

Mobility also opens up opportunities to explore resource-rich areas, mine atomic oxygen, and discover metals hidden within the clouds. Additionally, adjusting buoyancy can grant access to higher altitudes, potentially unveiling the planet’s secrets and expanding your city's horizons.

Features:


  • Choose from four different latitudes, each offering unique challenges and escalating difficulty.
  • Harness solar energy and capture lightning to power your city.
  • Grow hydroponic vegetables and synthesize SyntoMeat to sustain your colonists.
  • Mine atmospheric resources, establish production chains, and manufacture goods.
  • Manage colonist immigration to ensure a balanced skill set among your population.
  • Protect your city from solar flares, lightning strikes, storms, high winds, corrosive clouds, fires, and extreme pressures.
  • Build and deploy bots to assist with labour-intensive tasks.
  • Manage the buoyancy and balance of your floating city to ensure stability and safety
  • Navigate across Venus, avoiding natural hazards while discovering hidden resources and allows for a full planetary exploration of the clouds.
  • Develop your initial group of pioneers into a thriving cloud city with hundreds of residents.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+ supporting GPU with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 6th Generation Intel® Core™ i5 Processor or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Guide pioneering settlers among Venusian clouds in this space colonisation city builder. Grow food, collect energy, mine resources, balance buoyancy and weight to stay afloat in the treacherous Venusian atmosphere, and build a self-sufficient colony while navigating storms and acidic clouds.

*languages with full audio support
